thread.title: Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes

title: Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes
text:
Oxfam says Haiti director admitted using prostitutes 6:59am EST - 01:24 
Oxfam releases an internal investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct, in which it says former Haiti country director Roland Van Hauwermeiren admitted using prostitutes at his residence during a relief mission.   
Oxfam releases an internal investigation into allegations of sexual misconduct, in which it says former Haiti country director Roland Van Hauwermeiren admitted using prostitutes at his residence during a relief mission.  //reut.rs/2sGZ9vT
